item.description:
As an IRN member, you are invited to attend a meeting on September 22 to address IRN's needs as it makes its transition to new leadership

The meeting is at 6:30 pm in the conference room on the main floor of the Enterprise Center.

Several people have stepped up to volunteer to work on various tasks but there is still opportunity for your participation. IRN has operated on a straightforward model designed to minimize the amount of work required. Assistance on maintaining membership and financials would be appreciated. Most importantly, if members would like to continue to have a newsletter, volunteers are most definitely needed.

If you have questions, please feel free to contact Karen Blanchard (khss10@juno.com) or Dave Cormier or Karyl Lynch at info@irnetwork.org.

This meeting is a working meeting, putting plans in place for the next several months. Your participation is appreciated!
item.name: Organizational Meeting
